comment.body:
> [musickiller](#comment_1_15NScazvsCHNmiXi6o6nvaMiwjeJYizgZQ): Uncensored? I hoped that was porn -_-

This is just demo post and title :P

> [musickiller](#comment_1_15NScazvsCHNmiXi6o6nvaMiwjeJYizgZQ): Uncensored? I hoped that was porn -_-

Next step, I will try Full Screen and Subtitle ; )

> [p2p](#comment_1_13Z7XxTa7JuFat3KzzMWu3onwM6biLuurJ): 简体？还是这段文字繁简一样？繁体我属于勉强看懂但不会写的水平XD

https://ipfs.io/ipfs/QmS5yHo33p7Ho3dzZA726Z1yyA8iG8z9isLURpWuahXjMi
原文就是簡體了XD

> [p2p](#comment_1_13Z7XxTa7JuFat3KzzMWu3onwM6biLuurJ): 简体？还是这段文字繁简一样？繁体我属于勉强看懂但不会写的水平XD

我這邊的用途是利用IPFS、ZERONET來保留資訊，方便以後查閱 :D

> [musickiller](#comment_2_15NScazvsCHNmiXi6o6nvaMiwjeJYizgZQ): You are a bit late. There was a guy that was doing all that. tomasbond? Look here (if the site still works...)
> The problem with HTML 5 is tha subtitle there suck.The problem with ZN is that is sandboxes everything and not many players allow fullscreen
> That's in shirt. But there is more to that.

I know this site. He embed html file and video.js for playing. Full screen is worked, but subtitle is still no working...

> [imawho](#comment_1_16dAKXJdQKVKinMALLsL4YkdAkSDQiPAiw): 繁体我属于勉强看懂但不会写而且遇上复杂繁体字阅读速度低于读英文的水平……XD

用軟體改為簡體字來閱讀 :D
